revised_title: Sensory Neuron Properties in Novel Cell Lines
tldr: Researchers have created hybrid cell lines from rat dorsal root ganglia neurons fused with a mouse neuroblastoma, which exhibit properties of nociceptive sensory neurons. These novel cell lines can be used to study mechanisms involved in nociceptor activation and the regulation of sensory-neuron specific markers, including neuropeptides, providing a better understanding of pain and potential treatments.
